doc:
C. Martin Croker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C._Martin_Croker 0 Clay Martin Croker (January 10, 1962 – September 17, 2016), generally billed as C. Martin Croker, was an American animator and voice actor. He was best known for having provided the voices of Zorak and Moltar on the animated series Space Ghost Coast to Coast, replacing Don Messick, who originally voiced the characters in the 1960s series Space Ghost. Clay_Martin_Croker ( January_10_,_1962 – September_17_,_2016 ) , generally billed as C._Martin_Croker , was an_American_animator_and_voice_actor . He was_best_known for having_provided the_voices of Zorak_and_Moltar on the_animated_series_Space_Ghost_Coast to Coast , replacing Don_Messick , who originally voiced the_characters in the_1960s_series_Space_Ghost .
